title: [Wraithenmist, Lakeside Trail]
description: A few random shafts of moonlight pierce the thick fog rolling off the lake, making the tendrils of mist appear as if they are writhing endlessly.  The trail nearly disappears beneath the edge of the opaque black water, lapping about the ankles of any who care to tread through the area.
